description: My place is close to C Train, Fun Bars, Great Eats. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the light, and the comfy bed. My place is good for solo adventurers.
name: Stunning single in the heart of tree lined Bedstuy
review: This place was amazing. It had a very unique Brroklyn feel with the gorgeous exposed brick inside and the funky art. The hosts were very friendly and accomodating. Next time I am out in Brooklyn I would love to stay here.
